solution_line_template: Customer donated a total of ${total_customer_donation} because {customers_that_day} x {average_customer_donation} = <<{customers_that_day}*{average_customer_donation}={total_customer_donation}>>{total_customer_donation}

They got ${donation_unit} a total of {num_donation_units} times because {total_customer_donation} / {donation_unit} = <<{total_customer_donation}/{donation_unit}={num_donation_units}>>{num_donation_units}
